name: Spooked Out
description:
*IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT STAGES*

Spooked Out is a Halloween themed Platformer & Puzzle(maybe?!?).  As of now there is no definitive goal but it is fun to just jump around and mess about with the mechanics/art/sounds. You play as a ghost and try to make it to the end of the level.

I'm an Indie Developer and I have decided to publish my W.I.P to give me something to work towards and keep my motivation for game developing.

Thank you for checking out my W.I.P - yes it is quite fresh, not much mechanics and I am aware of the slight camera bugs but I am working on it. I hope the art is good enough to check it out! :) (started a week ago)
Please comment any ideas you have for it or anything that needs to change, bugs etc... much appreciated.

Any donations will go right back into a new PC for better developing of course! :) 

(NOTE: DONATIONS NOT AT ALL NECESSARY - PLEASE PLAY THE GAME ANYWAYS!)
